string-array.name: changelog_items
string-array.item: Ability to use Google Assitant with any of the 2 included home longpress framework
All individual colors or same color, with option to use tint at the same time.
Ability to assign Google Assitant to any of the device key - assign from all virtual buttons, screen swipe, screen sweep with any framework selected
Use Google Assitant without setting country to US
Quick Toggle colors mod
Quick Toggle Text mod
Global switch to restore all notification colors to stock for theme applications and original stock look
Removed ON/OFF from switches in settings for good application of themes
Added color option for search text with global restore
Lockscreen statusbar clock hidden for Potato clock
Lockscreen statusbar clock hidden for Phronesis clock
Charger connect animation with colors
Added option for s8 launcher with support for s8 Google widget
s8 Lockscreen and Weather font
Build.prop tweak for speaker phone
Secondary toggle text color. E.g. The wifi ssid name
Panel Handler color, conforms to global switch
Simple lockscreen weather color feature
Set low battery warning notification
Set critical battery warning notification
Added Power Menu background for MM Style
Ambient Display with switch option in rom control
Full Samsung Music color mod
Battery text color implemented with tint working at the same time
Now use tint and color at the same on statusbar icons. Tint on white background and color on dark background
Toggle animations applied when global toggle set to stock
Toggle help text color which also conform to global switch
Fixed Off Screen Memo
Fixed Stock SystemUI flashlight settings
Turn OFF flashlight from notification panel
Battery Bar reworked with more options. Now possible to select gradient
Custom Carrier label rework. More option added
Aroma option for Chainfire Systemless rooting
Aroma option for system mode rooting - patching to make it system mode install
Aroma option for Magisk rooting. Includes Magisk manager and SuperSU
Global switch to restore all notification colors to stock for theme applications and original stock look
Bluetooth Share FC on Systemless root should be fixed
Same color switch for statusbar icon
C9 Smart Manager aroma option removed as some were confused with this. Can be installed in rom control
Added option for s8 launcher with support for s8 Google widget
Custom carrier now keeps color after a restart
Rom control UI rework for some preferences and few things tidy up
Fixed clock color disappearing after each restart for Potato clock and Phronesis Style clock
Kernel Updated. Now at 1.2g. Fixes call issues for people that experienced it. And other improvements
Kernel add-on path updated
Better support for systemless rooting
A lot of applications updated. Over 20 apps for this release
And a lot more changes which has not been mentioned here. Please visit our rom thread of full changes
